title: PBE account Disable
body:
I been having my PBE account for years now 
and never got this once message about being disable
until today i try to log in to test out the new Galio (that i think looks amazing but might be a little to Over power with his abilities) and the message came up saying my account is currently disabled 
I tested out a lot of things 
i think the last thing i tested was Blood moon skins or Warwick

replies.body: We can help with this!  Reach out to us through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our account team will help towards retrieving your account.  We'll get back to you as soon as we can so you can get to testing Galio.  Be prepared that you may be asked some questions to verify ownership.  Hang tight!
